titles: Compassion towards captives chiefly towards our brethren and country-men who are in miserable bondage in Barbarie. Vrged and pressed in three sermons on Heb. 13.3. Preached in Plymouth, in October 1636. By Charles Fitz-Geffry.
author: Fitz-Geffry, Charles, 1575?-1638.
publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield, for Edward Forrest,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
